channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- encoding/xml
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- encoding/xml

item.title: CVE-2022-30633|2024-08-03T06:56:13.196Z -- go%20standard%20library -- encoding%2Fxml
item.description: Uncontrolled recursion in Unmarshal in encoding/xml before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allows an attacker to cause a panic due to stack exhaustion via unmarshalling an XML document into a Go struct which has a nested field that uses the 'any' field tag.

item.title: CVE-2022-28131|2024-08-03T05:48:36.830Z -- go%20standard%20library -- encoding%2Fxml
item.description: Uncontrolled recursion in Decoder.Skip in encoding/xml before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allows an attacker to cause a panic due to stack exhaustion via a deeply nested XML document.
